name: Slash Sword Minis Beta 1.0
description:
Hello everyone. Its Finaly here !

My first "2D roguelike platformer Beta game" 

I am a solo developer and i am  working on this game since 2021. The game is early access so bugs will be common. Thats why i have you to tell me what to fix and change game lovers!

Hope you enjoy my beta game and i look forward to some feedbacks !

Happy testing :) !
